the file is /etc/apt/sources.list; you can also use synaptic (system -> admin -> synaptic) to change you sources
there are some pages on the wiki to help you with repositories
i think 'kate' might be in the default install
you can try vi, but it's a bit rough going for new users; if kate doesn't work, try 'sudo nano /etc/apt/sources.list'
